TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartExportMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 控件的属性是可以全部导出、部分导出还是无法导出。

span.span: Specifies whether all, some, or none of a control's properties can be exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取值范围为枚举器可应用于属性指定可以导出 Web 部件控件的哪些属性。A value from the enumerator can be applied to the property to specify which properties from a Web Parts control can be exported. 默认情况下，属性无法导出控件和控件的属性设置为 None。By default, the properties of a control cannot be exported and the control's property is set to None. 若要启用导出控件的所有属性，设置到所有的值。To enable exporting all properties for the control, set the value to All. 若要在防止的导出的属性包含敏感数据的同时导出仅某些属性，你的属性值设置为 NonSensitiveData。To export only certain properties while preventing the export of properties that contain sensitive data, you set the property value to NonSensitiveData. 属性可以标记为敏感通过属性。A property can be marked as sensitive through the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 若要启用的 Web 应用程序在你的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中包含 Web 部件控件使用导出功能，你必须添加到一个特性``中的元素``部分中，如下所示的以下标记。To enable the export feature for a Web application that includes Web Parts controls, in the Web.config file for your application, you must add an attribute to the `` element within the `` section, as in the following markup. > > `` > > `` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，为导出的代码示例正常工作，则还必须更新 Web.config 文件的备注部分中所示。Note that for the export code example to work, you must also update your Web.config file as indicated in the Remarks section. 此示例的第一部分包含一个名为控件的代码`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件的本质相同的示例部分中找到的自定义控件类相似，只不过它将添加的概述，`Personalizable`属性设为`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性，以便可以导出该属性。This control is the same as the custom control that is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it adds a `Personalizable` attribute to the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property so the property can be exported. 请注意，特性声明中包含的值`true`为`isSensitive`参数，这意味着属性标记为敏感的数据导出目的。Note that the attribute declaration includes a value of `true` for the `isSensitive` parameter, meaning that the property is marked as sensitive data for export purposes. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定你将源代码编译到程序集、 将其放置在 Web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹和引用与程序集`Register`指令在 Web 页中。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意，在声明性的标记中，属性值设置为 All，意味着将导出甚至属性与敏感值。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to All, meaning that even properties with sensitive values will be exported. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/exportmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/exportmodevb.aspx#1)] 加载 Web 页在浏览器中，和上的谓词菜单控件，请单击导出谓词，按照说明进行操作来导出包含控件的状态和属性数据的说明文件。Load the Web page in a browser, and on the verbs menu of the control, click the export verb and follow the instructions to export a description file containing the control's state and property data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode All = int32(1)

summary.span: Web 部件控件的所有属性都可以导出。

span.span: All of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 无法导出 Web 部件控件的任何属性。

span.span: None of a Web Parts control's properties can be exported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode NonSensitiveData = int32(2)

summary.span: 仅能导出 Web 部件控件的已定义为非敏感数据的属性。

span.span: Only properties of a Web Parts control that have been defined as non-sensitive can be exported.
